攻撃を止めてはいけませんわ！\nたとえ動けなくなろうとも、攻撃を続けるのです！:
You mustn't stop the attack!
Even if you can't move, keep attacking!
そうは、言うけどねぇ……こいつら固すぎよ……！: You say that, but... these guys are too hard...!
（みんな撃墜されていく……どうすれば……！）: (Everyone's being shot down... What should I do...!?)
置いて逃げろと、言ったのに……\nお前、初めて俺の指示……無視したな……:
I told you to leave me behind and run away...
This is the first time you've ignored my instructions...
……ごめんなさい。でも、見捨てるだなんて、わたしには出来ない。: ...I'm sorry. But I can't abandon you.
すまなかったな……場を和ますための告白が、\nお前への呪いとなったか。:
I'm sorry... I didn't mean to make a confession to lighten the mood.
It became a curse on you, huh?
……実を言うと、あの言葉の真意、よくわかってなかった。: ...To tell the truth, I didn't really understand the true meaning of those words.
だけど、本当の私を知ってくれたあなたを……\nわたしに頼らせてくれたあなたを……:
But now that you know the real me...
I wanted to protect you... for letting me rely on you.
ありがとな。お前が守ってくれて、嬉しかったよ……: Thanks. I'm glad you protected me...
今度は、俺の番だ……みんなで、無事に帰るぞ。: Now it's my turn... Let's all go home safely.
白奈。こっちに寄れ。俺がお前の剣を導いてやる。\n俺の動きに合わせて……導いた先:
Shirona. Come closer. I'll guide your sword.
Match my movements... and pierce through where I lead you.
一回勝負だ。これで決められなければ、全員揃って大穴住まいだな。: Let's have a match. If we don't decide now, we'll all live in a big hole.
わたしは、地上での生活の方が好き……絶対に当ててみせるわ。: I prefer living on the surface... I'll definitely win.
同感だ……行くぞ……っ！\n合図と同時に、俺と白奈機は加速する。:
I agree... Let's go...!
At the signal, Hakuna and I accelerate.
座標をずらすな！ このまま真っ直ぐ、突き進め……！: Don't move the coordinates! Keep going straight ahead...!
狙いがブレる白奈を、俺が導く。\n貫くべき場所はわかっている。:
As Shirona's aim wavered, I guided her.
I know where to pierce.
うそ……メイズシフターの体を、貫いた……？: No way... It pierced the Mayscifer's body...?
っ、ぁあ……か、簡単な話だ……俺が気絶してる間こいつ……\n霞光は戦場のデータを:
Aaah... It's so simple... While I was unconscious, this guy...
Kasumi kept measuring battlefield data.
こいつには高精度の赤外線センサーが搭載されているからな。\n対象の熱源分布を、三:
This thing is equipped with high-precision infrared sensors, after all.
We can analyze the heat signature distribution of the target in three dimensions...
そこで、あのメイズシフターの体幹部に、\n熱が集中している部分があることが分かっ:
That’s when I told the top brass of that maise shifter...
I can tell that there's a part of the heat that's concentrated.
そして俺は、それが神経中枢かエネルギーの生成器官だと\n予測したわけだ……:
And I think it's either the nerve center or the energy generation organ.
That's what I predicted...
なるほど。動物も脳や心臓みたいな代謝活性の高い器官には、\n他の臓器よりも高い熱:
I see. Animals also have highly active metabolic organs like the brain and heart.
You have a higher fever than the other organs. You thought it was the same.
――それから安全地帯に降り立ったシリウスシュガー５人は、\n一度機体から出て%u:
—After that, the five Sirius Sugars descended into the safe zone
We leave the aircraft and gather for first aid for %username, username, and %userna.
手当を施し、%usernameusernameuserna%の無事を確信した５人:
After treating them, the five confirmed that %username, username, and user-na% were safe
I sighed in relief.
ケーキカット、みたいでしたね……？: It was like cutting a cake, right...?
なるほど。つまりはふたりの初めての共同作業だったっていうこと、か。: I see. In other words, it was their first collaboration.
おお、切り分けて配ってやるから、ちゃんと食えよお前ら……: Oh, I'll cut them up and hand them out, so make sure you eat them all...
ふふっ……ごめんなさい、面白くて、つい……: Hehe... I'm sorry. It was so funny, I couldn't help myself...
あと、あのプロポーズは、%usernameusernameuserna%が場を\:
Also, for that proposal, %usernameusernamesuserna% will take the place
It's like a joke I said to soften things up, so don't worry about it, everyone.
ま、だろうとは思ってたけどね。あまりにも突然だったし。: Well, I figured as much. It was just too sudden.
そう、だからみんなであれを食べる必要は……ぷっ、あはは！\nダメ、想像しちゃった:
That's right, so there's no need to eat with everyone... Pfft, ahaha!
No, imagining it would be so funny... Ahaha!
し、白奈さんって、あんなふうに笑うんですのね。: I-I didn't know Hakuna-san could smile like that.
でも、ああやって笑う白奈さん、なんだかとても綺麗です。: But the way she smiles like that is kind of beautiful.
……ようやく、素が出せたみたい、だな……っ……: ...Looks like you've finally shown your true colors...
どうやらまた気絶しちゃったみたいだね。: Looks like he passed out again.
メイズシンドロームの症状が酷いのに無茶したんだから、当然でしょ。: It’s only natural, considering how reckless she’d been despite the terrible symptoms of the mace syndrome.
命に別状はなさそうですが、応急手当も終わりましたし、\nそろそろ脱出しましょうか:
Her life didn’t seem to be in danger, but she’d finished first aid
Let's get out of here.
もしかして新手！？ もう無理だっての！: Are you new?! I can't do this anymore!
ようやく発見出来たな。いったいどこまで潜っていたんだか。: We've finally found it. Just how far have we been hiding?
カラフルブーケの皆さん！？ どうしてここに……？: Everyone in the colorful bouquet?! Why are you here...?
探索計画の予定期間時刻を超過しても戻ってこなかったからな。\nカラフルブーケ総出:
After all, they didn't come back even after the planned time for the exploration plan had passed.
The whole colorful bouquet came to save you.
それとも、自分達の足で帰るか？: Or do you want to go home on your own?
冗談言ってないで、早く助けろー！: Stop joking around and help me already!
……これで地上に帰れる。: ...Now I can return to the surface.
（%usernameusernameuserna%……\nあなたを守ることが出来:
(%user name, username, user name, %...)
I'm so glad I was able to protect you.)
